name: Marvin CRUMP, Petitioner v. Michael WENEROWICZ, Superintendent of SCI, Graterford, Department of Corrections, Respondent

parties: Marvin CRUMP, Petitioner v. Michael WENEROWICZ, Superintendent of SCI, Graterford, Department of Corrections, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of April, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and the Application for an Immediate Hearing are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
41 A.3d 1288
Marvin CRUMP, Petitioner v. Michael WENEROWICZ, Superintendent of SCI, Graterford, Department of Corrections, Respondent.
No. 176 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 24, 2012.
